thread.title: The World Bank treats human rights like 'an infectious disease' says UN expert
thread.title_full: The World Bank treats human rights like 'an infectious disease' says UN expert - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: The World Bank treats human rights like 'an infectious disease' says UN expert
text: The World Bank is a "human-rights free zone" because it pretends to be above politics, a top UN lawyer and expert on the issue has said. Philip Alston , the UN's special rapporteur on extreme poverty and human rights, has published a highly
